hero_description: Specializing in machine learning and natural language processing.
about_large_text: Machine learning engineer focused on NLP and applied AI.
about_details_p1: I work across the full ML lifecycle, from data collection to deployment. Currently focused on Kurdish language processing.
experience_1_description: Building AI solutions with focus on machine learning and computer vision.
experience_2_description: Developed NLP models for Kurdish language processing. Collected and processed 140K+ news articles for training data.
experience_3_description: Built and maintained websites for local businesses.
education_1_description: Focus on software development, algorithms, and AI.
education_2_description: Intensive program on ML fundamentals and neural networks.
ner_xlmr_description: Fine-tuned xlm-roberta-base for Named Entity Recognition in Kurmanji Kurdish. Achieved an F1 score of 0.87 on the test set.
dialect_classifier_tags: Machine Learning, NLP, Gradio, Hugging Face
dialect_classifier_description: A web application that identifies whether Kurdish text is written in Sorani or Kurmanji. Achieved 92% classification accuracy.
gorrer_description: A web tool that converts Kurdish text between Arabic and Latin scripts with accurate transliteration.
kurdtype_description: A platform for discovering and downloading open-licensed Kurdish fonts for content creators.
corpus_description: Collected and processed over 140,000 Kurdish news articles for NLP research at UKH AI Center.
publication_title: Fine-tuning XLM-RoBERTa for Named Entity Recognition in Kurmanji Kurdish
publication_description: In this paper, I develop an XLM-RoBERTa-based NER system for Kurmanji Kurdish, fine-tuned on a manually annotated dataset (7,919 sentences) and achieving strong F1 scores. The work was presented at the 9th Widening NLP Workshop (WiNLP 2025).
